00027 class KeyMsgGenerator : public SubSystem {
00028     public:
00030         class Key : public Linkable<Key> {
00031             friend class KeyMsgGenerator;
00032             public:
00034                 enum State { 
00036                     Invalid, 
00038                     Set, 
00040                     InProcess 
00041                 };
00042                 
00044                 Key() : m_key_code((KeyCode) -1), m_duration(0), m_pause(0), m_state(Invalid) {}
00046                 Key(KeyCode key_code, UINT32 duration) : m_key_code(key_code), m_duration(duration), m_pause(0), m_state(Set) {}
00048                 Key(UINT32 pause) : m_key_code((KeyCode) -1), m_duration(0), m_pause(pause), m_state(Set) {}
00049 
00051                 KeyCode GetKeyCode() const { return (m_key_code); }
00053                 UINT32 GetDuration() const { return (m_duration); } 
00055                 UINT32 GetPause() const { return (m_pause); } 
00056                 
00057             private:
00058                 KeyCode m_key_code;
00059                 UINT32 m_duration;      // in milliseconds
00060                 UINT32 m_pause;         // in milliseconds
00061                 State m_state;
00062 
00063                 State GetState() const { return (m_state); }
00064                 void SetState(State state) { m_state = state; }
00065         };
00066 
00068         KeyMsgGenerator();
00069 
00071         static KeyMsgGenerator* GetInstance() { return m_instance; }
00072 
00074         virtual const WCHAR* GetName() const { return L"APOXI KeyMsgGenerator (Apc)"; }
00075 
00077         virtual BootSequenceState InvokeAt() const { return (SubSystemManager::c_run_level_3); }
00078 
00080         virtual UINT8 GetPriority() const { return (100); } 
00081 
00083         virtual void OnPowerUp();
00084 
00086         virtual void OnPowerDown();
00087 
00089         static BOOLEAN Enqueue(const Key &key);
00090 
00091     private:
00092         static SystemTimer m_timer;
00093         static KeyMsgGenerator *m_instance;
00094         static Semaphore m_sem;
00095         static LinkedList<Key>  m_key_list;
00096         static Key *m_active_key;
00097 
00098         static void SendNextKey();
00099 
00100         // Callback function for key timer.
00101         static void OnTimeout(void *key);
00102 };
